title: Nothing Else Matters (solo ver 4)
lyrics:
Nothing else matters interlude solo
Metallica
tabbed by caleb (bassman_caz@hotmail.com)

Ive submitted this before, but i had to do it again. i left out how much to 
bend the steps up, and a few pull offs and things. To the cunt who reckons 
the last one i did was completely wrong, im gonna say tune up your guitar 
properly then tell me what wrong with it. Ive studied the song and slowed it 
down. Im almost certain its right. Bare in mind it is NOT the whole interlude, 
but merely the little solo thing at the end of it.
